devdoc.author: @neuro_0x
devdoc.details: The orchestrator contract for the CoinGenie ecosystem.

params.airdropClaimableERC20FactoryAddress: The address of the AirdropERC20ClaimableFactory contract
params.erc20FactoryAddress: The address of the ERC20Factory contract

params.airdropAmount: The amount of tokens available for airdrop
params.airdropTokenAddress: The address of the airdrop token
params.expirationTimestamp: The expiration timestamp of the airdrop
params.maxWalletClaimCount: The maximum number of tokens that can be claimed by a wallet if not in the whitelist
params.merkleRoot: The merkle root of the whitelist
params.tokenOwner: The address of the token owner

returns.dropAddress: The address of the newly deployed airdrop contract

params._address: The address to get the airdrops for
The address to get the tokens for

params.category: The category to get the payout address for

returns._0: receiver The address to receive the payout

params.category: The category to get the payout share for

returns._0: share The share of the payout

launchToken(string,string,uint256,addres.details: This function deploys a new token contract and initializes it with provided parameters.

params.affiliateFeeRecipient: The address to receive the affiliate fee
params.autoWithdrawThreshold: The threshold for the amount of tokens to swap for ETH
params.burnPercentage: The percent in basis points to burn on every tx if this token is deflationary
params.customConfigProps: A struct of configuration booleans for the token
params.feePercentage: The percent in basis points to use as a tax
params.feeRecipient: The address to receive the tax fees
params.initialSupply: The initial supply of the token
params.maxPerWallet: The maximum amount of tokens allowed to be held by one wallet
params.maxTaxSwap: The maximum amount of tokens allowed to be swapped at once by manual or autoswap
params.name: The name of the token
params.tokenOwner: The address that will be the owner of the token

returns._0: _tokenAddress The address of the newly deployed token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._quoteThreshold: The threshold for the amount of tokens to swap for ETH

params.amount: The amount of tokens to swap
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to swap

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.category: The category to set the payout address for
params.receiver: The address to receive the payout

UNISWAP_V2_ROUTER.details: The address of the Uniswap V2 Router. The contract uses the router for liquidity provision and token swaps

_airdropClaimableERC20Factory.details: Stores the address of the AirdropERC20Claimable contract.

_erc20Factory.details: Stores the address of the ERC20Factory contract.

_payouts.details: A mapping of payout categories to payouts.

claimableAirdropCreatedBy.details: A mapping of airdrops launched by a specific owner.

createdClaimableAirdrops.details: Stores the addresses of all airdrops launched by the contract.

launchedTokens.details: Stores the addresses of all tokens launched by the contract.

quoteThreshold.details: The threshold for the amount of tokens to swap for ETH

tokensLaunchedBy.details: A mapping of tokens launched by a specific owner.

devdoc.title: CoinGenie

createClaimableAirdrop(address,address,u.notice: Launch a new instance of the CoinGenieAirdropClaimable Contract.

getClaimableAirdropsForAddress(address).notice: Get the airdrops created by a specific address.

getPayoutAddress(uint8).notice: Get the payout address for a specific category.

getPayoutShare(uint8).notice: Get the payout share for a specific category.

launchToken(string,string,uint256,addres.notice: Launch a new instance of the ERC20.

setQuoteThreshold(uint256).notice: Set the threshold for the amount of tokens to swap for ETH.

updatePayout(uint8,address,uint256).notice: Set the payout address for a specific category.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw the contract balance to the payout addresses.
